name: Scott Allen SPERLING, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Scott Allen SPERLING, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of United States v. Haymond, 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2369, --- L.E.2d ---- (2019).
casebody.head_matter:
Scott Allen SPERLING, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 17-8390.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 28, 2019.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of United States v. Haymond, 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2369, --- L.E.2d ---- (2019).
